We will help you identify difference between where you really are on your transformational journey
We captured data from hundreds of companies in your industry as well as used in real data from your own system to show you where you stand on the Enterprise Transformation Journey
By Eddie Murphy & Victoria Beckham
Tech Multilpier asset is a consolidated assessment tool evaluating how well technology and IT capablities enable the business and "multiplies" values

The assets seek to identify the most important KPI's for an organization around the four "New IT" areas : Purpose , Future Model, Foundation , Innovation

The assets includes inputs from multiple internal assests and client work
Lets see what do you think about the state of your company and your competitors are in each of these main categories. Use the sliders to adjust the values .
This is how you see the current situation between you and your direct competitors purely from the subjective point of view.
